Over Peptide Shop

Toonaangevende Europese leverancier van premium onderzoekspeptiden met geverifieerde zuiverheid en volledige transparantie.

Onze geavanceerde laboratoria en strenge kwaliteitscontrole zorgen ervoor dat elke peptide die we leveren voldoet aan 99%+ zuiverheidsnormen. Of u nu Semaglutide, BPC-157, Tirzepatide of andere onderzoekspeptiden nodig heeft, wij leveren HPLC-geverifieerde verbindingen met volledige COA-documentatie.

Veelgestelde vragen

FAQ

What makes your peptides different from competitors?
Our peptides undergo rigorous HPLC and Mass Spectrometry analysis with third-party verification. Every batch comes with a Certificate of Analysis (COA) showing 99.9%+ purity.
How quickly can I receive my order?
All orders are dispatched within 24 hours. We offer standard delivery (3-5 business days) and express shipping (1-2 business days) options.
Do you provide Certificates of Analysis (COA)?
Yes, every product includes a batch-specific COA with HPLC chromatogram, mass spectrometry data, purity percentage, and storage recommendations.
Where can I buy peptides in Europe?
You can buy peptides online from Peptide Shop with fast delivery across Europe. Delivery times vary by destination and service level, and we offer both standard and express options.
What payment methods do you accept?
We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers for institutional orders. All transactions are securely processed.
How should I store my peptides?
Lyophilized peptides should be stored at -20°C for long-term storage. Once reconstituted, store at 2-8°C and use within the timeframe specified in the product documentation. Always protect from light and repeated freeze-thaw cycles.
Are your peptides for human consumption?
No. All our peptides are sold strictly for research and laboratory use only. They are not intended for human or veterinary use, food additives, drugs, or cosmetic applications.
Can I get a refund or replacement if there's an issue?
Absolutely. If you receive a product that doesn't meet our advertised purity specifications, we offer a full refund or replacement. Please contact our support team with your COA and any supporting documentation within 30 days of receipt.

Buy Peptides Online Netherlands & Europe - Your Complete Guide

Buy Peptides Netherlands

Looking to buy peptides in Netherlands? Peptide Shop offers premium research peptides with 99% purity verified by HPLC analysis. Our best-selling peptides include Semaglutide, Tirzepatide, BPC-157, TB-500, and Melanotan 2. All orders include a Certificate of Analysis (COA) and are dispatched within 24 hours.

Buy Peptides Europe

Buy peptides online with fast European delivery. We ship to Netherlands, Germany, France, Spain, Italy, Belgium, Austria, Ireland, and Portugal. Whether you need GLP-1 peptides for weight loss research, BPC-157 for muscle recovery studies, or growth hormone peptides, Peptide Shop is your trusted European peptide supplier with discreet, temperature-controlled shipping.

Peptides for Weight Loss Research

Our weight loss peptides for sale include the latest GLP-1 receptor agonists: Semaglutide, Tirzepatide, Retatrutide, and Cagrilintide. These research peptides are HPLC-verified and come with full documentation for metabolic research applications. Buy peptides for weight loss studies with confidence from a trusted European peptide supplier.

Peptides for Muscle Growth Research

Buy peptides for muscle growth and recovery research including BPC-157, TB-500, and IGF-1 variants. Our bodybuilding peptides are research-grade with 99% purity, ideal for tissue repair and regeneration studies. Fast dispatch and competitive prices make us the preferred choice for researchers studying anabolic pathways.
